elements.name: Registered user creates twelve month pets subscription

steps.name: a registered user with no prior subscription
the user logs in
the user selects the Pets crate
the user selects a twelve month subscription plan
the user submits valid subscription information
the new subscription should be added to the user account
the user should receive a pets confirmation email
the recurly subscription should have the correct rebill date

elements.name: International user signs up for random month pets subscription

steps.name: a registered user with a Austria address
the user logs in
the user selects the Pets crate
the user sets their country to Austria
the user selects a random month subscription plan
the user submits valid subscription information
the new subscription should be added to the user account
recurly should have a matching international subscription
the recurly billing address should have no state
the user should receive a pets confirmation email
